House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05520
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING THE IMPOSITION OF THE CAPITAL GAINS TAX ON THE TRANSFER OF TAX DECLARATION, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 24 (D) AND 27 (D) OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8424, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997
ABSTRACT : This bill specifically clarifies that the CGT should not be levied on the transfer of tax declaration in order to protect the tax paying public from unnecessary payments.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
